LEVEL 26
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: LEVEL 26
By Y.K.TAN on Wednesday, May 15, 2002 - 12:14 am:

There are two ways to win this stage:

easy way:
the easy way,go to town(At option menu) save game and all,come back with 3 lives. Than at the start of the stage,create a box infront of the plant and the plant will go forward and destroy the box,and the plant will fall to it's death. Destroy the box on the metal ledge and get the key,you'll be stuck there,and at menu screen,press give up and you will die,and restarting again doing the same way to kill the plant,BUT NOT GOING DOWN TO THAT STUCKY PLACE,move left to your goal gate.

Hard way:
At the start of the stage,destroy the box and go down. Go down and hide in the wall in the ground(not the right or left hole) once the flying mummy thingy(look's like wrapped up mummy,btw) block it. And create a box,be careful of joker,destroy the box below the key. Than climb your way up on the left side of the stage,destroying the plant with box destroying method when it comes on the box,and fall down the ledge,(not block this time though),and get the key,and climb up left to win.
